section.name: Introduction
section.p: This is a short TODO list with things that should be fixed in smsj. Please let me know if you would like to help out with anything on this list, or if you have something that should be added to this list.

section.name: Update the 7bit charset encoder/decoder
section.p: The current 7bit charset encoder/decoder is incomplete. There are some characters that must be encoded as two 7bit characters.

section.name: Remove GsmOperators class
section.p: Is this class really neccessary? It is not a complete listing anyway...

section.name: Create a demo app
section.p: There should be a simple demo app. Either a command line tool or a swing application.

section.name: Complete the EMS support
section.p: The current EMS implementation is only a stub implementation. I created a bunch of classes but never completed the implementation.

section.name: Update the UCP transport
section.p: The current UCP transport is currently in a bad shape. It should work to submit simple text messages, but I'm unsure if UDH, 8bit and UCS2 messages works. I would really like to have some help here since I don't have access to an UCP server right now.

section.name: Complete the MMS part
section.p: The MMS part is perhaps 75% done. The API is a bit rough as well.

section.name: Add query, cancel and replace to the sms transport API
section.p: Should be quite simple to add.

section.name: Add an asynchronous transport API
section.p: This would really be a boost for smsj. This would make it possible to use smsj in implementations that need to send alot of SMS but at the same time keep track of all messages.

section.name: Add support for incoming SMS
section.p: This feature is perhaps the most requested feature.

section.name: Add OMA DRM encoder.
section.p: Add a new MimeMultipart type that can wrap OMA drm files.

section.name: Add tutorial and documentation.
section.p: The documentation that is available today is a bit thin.
